Sentence: Only sixteen years old, John Grady runs away from home with his (Grady) friend Rawlins
When Don Hector finds out about it, he (Hector) turns John Grady and Rawlins over to the thuggish, corrupt police captain of Encantada
Now he (Grady) is being held in jail, and John Grady and Rawlins are accused of being his (Grady) co- conspirators
Blevins is executed, but John Grady and Rawlins are merely imprisoned in the town of Saltillo
Although Rawlins returns to Texas, John Grady is intent on reuniting with Alejandra
